snippet: A critical review leads to a search for a new chef at Le Cirque.
abstract: A critical review leads to a search for a new chef at Le Cirque.
lead_paragraph: Less than a month after Le Cirque received an unflattering review in The New York Times, the chef at the venerable Midtown Manhattan restaurant is going to be replaced, according to the Diner’s Journal blog. The chef, Olivier Reginensi, who had started at the restaurant in January, was told by one of the owners that the restaurant was looking for a replacement. The Times gave Le Cirque one star, a downgrade from the three stars it received in a 2008 Times review. Read more about the personnel shift here.

headline.main: For Le Cirque, a Bad Review and the Chef Is Headed Out
